name: Bee'sLove
description:
Was made for Epic Winter jam 2019 but we were late by 1 min so now it is just a game on itch
Bee's Love:

Fight for the love of your queen in Bee's Love! Gain control of the flowers and deliver the nectar to the queen. If you defeat a rival, they drop honey that the queen will accept too! Prove to the queen that you are the best bee around!
